00082         public void SendMail()
00083         {
00084             try
00085             {
00086                 using (System.Net.Mail.MailMessage message = new System.Net.Mail.MailMessage())
00087                 {
00088                     char[] Splitter = { ',' };
00089                     string[] AddressCollection = To.Split(Splitter);
00090                     for (int x = 0; x < AddressCollection.Length; ++x)
00091                     {
00092                         message.To.Add(AddressCollection[x]);
00093                     }
00094                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(CC))
00095                     {
00096                         AddressCollection = CC.Split(Splitter);
00097                         for (int x = 0; x < AddressCollection.Length; ++x)
00098                         {
00099                             message.CC.Add(AddressCollection[x]);
00100                         }
00101                     }
00102                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Bcc))
00103                     {
00104                         AddressCollection = Bcc.Split(Splitter);
00105                         for (int x = 0; x < AddressCollection.Length; ++x)
00106                         {
00107                             message.Bcc.Add(AddressCollection[x]);
00108                         }
00109                     }
00110                     message.Subject = Subject;
00111                     message.From = new System.Net.Mail.MailAddress((From));
00112                     message.Body = Body;
00113                     message.Priority = Priority;
00114                     message.SubjectEncoding = System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding("ISO-8859-1");
00115                     message.BodyEncoding = System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding("ISO-8859-1");
00116                     message.IsBodyHtml = true;
00117                     foreach (Attachment TempAttachment in Attachments)
00118                     {
00119                         message.Attachments.Add(TempAttachment);
00120                     }
00121                     System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient smtp = new System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient(Server, Port);
00122                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00123                     {
00124                         smtp.Credentials = new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password);
00125                     }
00126                     if (UseSSL)
00127                         smtp.EnableSsl = true;
00128                     else
00129                         smtp.EnableSsl = false;
00130                     smtp.Send(message);
00131                 }
00132             }
00133             catch { throw; }
00134         }
